name: gossa
tagline: A fast self-hosted file sharing application with a clean web interface
description: Gossa is a fast self-hosted file sharing application. It supports drag-and-drop uploads, directory browsing, public links, and real-time change detection through a clean web UI. Designed for easy file hosting and sharing.

features.title: Static File Server
features.description: Serve files and directories over HTTP

features.title: Directory Browsing
features.description: Browse folders through a web interface

features.title: File Downloads
features.description: Download files directly from the browser

features.title: Minimal Configuration
features.description: Run the server with minimal setup

features.title: Command-Line Interface
features.description: Control server behavior using CLI options

features.title: Self-Hosted Deployment
features.description: Host files on your own infrastructure
